author: barnabasbusa
content:
looks like devnet 8 became a bit unhealthy: 
Last epoch was :
```Epoch 3171:
  Proposals: 16/32 (50.00%)
  Attestations: 118/161 (73.29%)
    Source timely: 115/161 (71.43%)
    Target correct: 118/161 (73.29%)
    Target timely: 118/161 (73.29%)
    Head correct: 117/161 (72.67%)
    Head timely: 58/161 (36.02%)
  Sync committees: 5930/8192 (72.39%)```
